title.text: Mining and Classification of Neologisms in Persian Blogs

entities.text: Mining and Classification of Neologisms in Persian Blogs

abstractContent.text: The exponential growth of the Persian blo-gosphere and the increased number of neolog-isms create a major challenge in NLP applications of Persian blogs.
This paper describes a method for extracting and classifying newly constructed words and borrowings from Persian blog posts.

entities.text: extracting and classifying newly constructed words and borrowings from Persian blog posts

abstractContent.text: The analysis of the occurrence of neologisms across five distinct topic categories points to a correspondence between the topic domain and the type of neologism that is most commonly encountered.
The results suggest that different approaches should be implemented for the automatic detection and processing of neologisms depending on the domain of application.

entities.text: automatic detection and processing of neologisms
